entry.string: Acceptance of Terms of Use and Amendments

entry.string: Each time you use or cause access to this web site, you agree to be bound by these

entry.string: and as amended from time to time with or without notice to you. In addition, if you are using a particular service on or through this web site, you will be subject to any rules or guidelines applicable to those services and they shall be incorporated by reference into these

In eddeeshun, iff yuoo ere-a useeng a perteecooler serfeece-a oon oor thruoogh thees veb seete-a, yuoo veell be-a soobject tu uny rooles oor gooeedelines eppleeceble-a tu thuse-a serfeeces und zeey shell be-a incurpureted by refference-a intu zeese

Um gesh dee bork, bork!Yuoo egree-a thet zee oovners ooff thees veb seete-a ixclooseefely reserfe-a zee reeght und mey, et uny teeme-a und veethuoot nuteece-a und uny leeebility tu yuoo, mudeeffy oor deescuntinooe-a thees veb seete-a und its serfeeces oor delete-a zee deta yuoo prufeede-a, vhezeer tempurereely oor permunently. Bork bork bork! Ve-a shell hefe-a nu respunseebilty oor leeebility fur zee teemeliness, deleshun, feeeloore-a tu sture-a, ineccoorecy, oor impruper deleefery ooff uny deta oor inffurmeshun.

entry.string: Registration and Password

entry.string: You are responsible to maintain the confidentiality of your password and shall be responsible for all uses via your registration and/or login, whether authorized or unauthorized by you. You agree to immediately notify us of any unauthorized use or your registration, user account or password.

Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp! Yuoo egree-a tu immedeeetely nuteeffy us ooff uny unoothureezed use-a oor yuoor regeestreshun, user eccuoont oor pessvurd. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Your Conduct
entry.translation: Yuoor Cundooct

entry.string: You agree that all information or data of any kind, whether text, software, code, music or sound, photographs or graphics, video or other materials ("Content"), publicly or privately provided, shall be the sole responsibility of the person providing the Content or the person whose user account is used. You agree that our web site may expose you to Content that may be objectionable or offensive. We shall not be responsible to you in any way for the Content that appears on this web site nor for any error or omission.
entry.translation: Yuoo egree-a thet ell inffurmeshun oor deta ooff uny keend, vhezeer text, sufftvere-a, cude-a, mooseec oor suoond, phutugrephs oor grepheecs, feedeu oor oozeer metereeels ("Cuntent"), poobleecly oor preefetely prufeeded, shell be-a zee sule-a respunseebility ooff zee persun prufeeding zee Cuntent oor zee persun vhuse-a user eccuoont is used. Bork bork bork! Yuoo egree-a thet oooor veb seete-a mey ixpuse-a yuoo tu Cuntent thet mey be-a oobjecshuneble-a oor ooffffenseefe-a. Ve-a shell nut be-a respunseeble-a tu yuoo in uny vey fur zee Cuntent thet eppeers oon thees veb seete-a nur fur uny irrur oor oomeessiun. Bork bork bork!
